response.original_title: 恐い動画　限定解禁5
response.overview: A contributor films a couple visiting a monument of love fulfillment for a wedding screening.The "Unrequited Spirit of a Woman" in which a rotting spirit opens its mouth and grabs the couple; the "Haunting Spirits of a Spiritual Ryokan" in which two people are surrounded by multiple spirits; and "The Spellbound Spirits of a Spiritual Ryokan" in which a woman is captured by the spirit of a woman who is in the middle of a conversation with her senior at an inn on a business trip and begins filming them because she feels strange.
response.title: Kowai Douga Gentei Kaikin 5
